description.p: The GP layer as a dependence on the Logging module. So you first need to get this module from the download page and install it in your Platform and/or the IDE. Installing the module is simply done by placing the file logging.jar in the modules directory that is located in the user directory.
The user directory is the one that you specified in a file called ide.cfg located in the bin directory of the NetBeans distribution. In this file you just need to add the line
that points to where you want to place your user directory.

As for the logging module, you just need to place the file GP.jar in the module directory of your NetBeans user directory.
